import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import { Row, Container, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; import data from "../../data/Trip.json"; import NavbarComp from "../../components/navbar/NavbarComp"; import "./styledet.css"; import res from "../../assets/icons/resort.png"; import air from "../../assets/icons/airplane.png"; import eat from "../../assets/icons/eating.png"; import calend from "../../assets/icons/calendar.png"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { UserContext } from "../../context/Contextusr"; function DetailPage({ match }) { const [state, dispatch] = useContext(UserContext); let history = useHistory(); const datas = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("trip")); const [detail, setDetail] = useState({}); const { id } = match.params; const [qty, setqty] = useState(1); useEffect(() => { let idd = id - 1; setDetail(datas[idd]); }, []); const handleBook = () => { dispatch({ type: "ADD_TRIP", payload: { id: detail?.id, qty: 2, status: "waiting payment", }, }); console.log(state.order); dispatch({ type: "SAVE_TRIP", }); }; return ( <>

{detail.day}D/{detail?.night}N {detail.title}

{detail?.country}

 {/* =============================== */}

Information Trip
Acomodation

Hotel {detail.night} Night

Transpotasion

{detail.transpotation}

Eat

{detail.eat}

Duration

{detail.day}Day/{detail.night}Night

Date Trip

{detail.date}

Description

{detail.description}

IDR. {detail.price} / Person

{qty}

Total : {detail.price}



); } export default DetailPage;
